name: media-tic
description: An interface made with React for the MediaTIC project from the LIIT at the UNED Costa Rica.

scripts.dev: rimraf build && cross-env PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel ./public/index.html -d build --open
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && cross-env PARCEL_AUTOINSTALL=false parcel build ./public/index.html --no-source-maps

author: Kenneth P. Barquero <https://github.com/kenpb/>
